title: Luis Álamos
text: Luis "El Zorro" Álamos Luque (25 December 1923, <a href="Cha%C3%B1aral">Chañaral</a> – 26 June 1983) was a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Coach%20%28sport%29">manager</a> from <a href="Chile">Chile</a>, who guided the <a href="Chile%20national%20football%20team">national team</a> at the <a href="1966%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1966</a> and <a href="1974%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1974 FIFA World Cup</a> but was unable to advance from group stage on both the occasion. Álamos was also manager for Chilean team <a href="Colo-Colo">Colo-Colo</a> for four seasons (1972–1975) and for <a href="Club%20Universidad%20de%20Chile">Universidad de Chile</a>.
